name: O.C.D. - On Completeness & Dissonance
description:
On Completeness & Dissonance is a game about satisfying your inner perfectionist: make each pattern complete by rotating the board so the loose tiles can slide into the empty slots.

Sounds easy?
It is.

Enduring the painful sight of a tiled pattern corrupted by a single misplaced or misaligned tile?
Not so much.

  • 60 potentially brain-halting levels, with 60 more available through DLC;
  • 10 elements introduced gradually, including high-voltage dischargers, antitiles and wormholes;
  • Don't panic as you try to beat each level with as few moves as possible within a time limit;
  • Mouse + keyboard and game controller supported;
